file.name: clientConfig.yaml
file.content:
x-generator: NSwag v13.9.4.0 (NJsonSchema v10.3.1.0 (Newtonsoft.Json v12.0.0.0))
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: FOS - Parental Leaves API
  version: 1.0.0
servers:
  - url: 'https://vmst-paternity-leave.azurewebsites.net'
paths:
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetParentalLeaves
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: dateOfBirth
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParentalLeavesResponse'
    post:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_SetParentalLeave
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      requestBody:
        x-name: parentalLeave
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParentalLeave'
        required: true
        x-position: 2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PostParentalLeaveResponse'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/{applicationId}/periods':
    put:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_UpdatePeriods
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: applicationId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            format: guid
          x-position: 2
      requestBody:
        x-name: periods
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        required: true
        x-position: 3
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/octet-stream:
              schema:
                type: string
                format: binary
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/rights':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetRights
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: dateOfBirth
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/Right'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/estimated-payment-plan':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetEstimatedPaymentPlan
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: dateOfBirth
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/EstimatedPaymentPlan'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/{applicationId}/payment-plan':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetPaymentPlan
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: applicationId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 2
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentPlansResponse'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/periods/end-date':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetPeriodEndDate
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: startDate
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          x-position: 2
        - name: length
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 3
        - name: percentage
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 4
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PeriodEndDateResponse'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/parental-leaves/periods/length':
    get:
      tags:
        - ParentalLeave
      operationId: ParentalLeave_GetPeriodLength
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
        - name: startDate
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          x-position: 2
        - name: endDate
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            format: date-time
          x-position: 3
        - name: percentage
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 4
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PeriodLengthResponse'
  /pension-funds:
    get:
      tags:
        - Pension
      operationId: Pension_GetPensionFunds
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PensionFundsResponse'
  '/users/{nationalRegistryId}/pregnancy-status':
    get:
      tags:
        - Pregnancy
      operationId: Pregnancy_GetPregnancyStatus
      parameters:
        - name: nationalRegistryId
          in: path
          required: true
          schema:
            type: string
            nullable: true
          x-position: 1
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/PregnancyStatus'
  /unions:
    get:
      tags:
        - Union
      operationId: Union_GetUnions
      responses:
        '200':
          description: ''
          content:
            application/json:
              schema:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/UnionsResponse'
components:
  schemas:
    ParentalLeavesResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        parentalLeaves:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/ParentalLeave'
    ParentalLeave:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - applicationId
        - applicant
        - expectedDateOfBirth
        - dateOfBirth
        - email
        - phoneNumber
        - paymentInfo
        - periods
        - employers
        - status
        - rightsCode
      properties:
        applicationId:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        applicant:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
          pattern: '^\d{10}$'
        otherParentId:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        expectedDateOfBirth:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        dateOfBirth:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        email:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        phoneNumber:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        paymentInfo:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentInfo'
        periods:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        employers:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Employer'
        status:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        rightsCode:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        attachments:
          type: array
          nullable: true
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Attachment'
    PaymentInfo:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - bankAccount
        - personalAllowance
        - personalAllowanceFromSpouse
        - union
        - pensionFund
        - privatePensionFund
        - privatePensionFundRatio
      properties:
        bankAccount:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        personalAllowance:
          type: number
          format: float
        personalAllowanceFromSpouse:
          type: number
          format: float
        union:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Union'
        pensionFund:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PensionFund'
        privatePensionFund:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/PensionFund'
        privatePensionFundRatio:
          type: number
          format: float
    Union:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        name:
          type: string
    PensionFund:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - id
        - name
      properties:
        id:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        name:
          type: string
    Period:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - from
        - to
        - ratio
        - approved
        - paid
      properties:
        from:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        to:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        ratio:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        approved:
          type: boolean
        paid:
          type: boolean
        rightsCodePeriod:
          type: string
          nullable: true
    Employer:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - email
        - nationalRegistryId
      properties:
        email:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        nationalRegistryId:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
    Attachment:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      required:
        - attachmentType
        - attachmentBytes
      properties:
        attachmentType:
          type: string
          minLength: 1
        attachmentBytes:
          type: string
          format: byte
          minLength: 1
    PostParentalLeaveResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        status:
          type: string
        id:
          type: string
    Right:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        independentMonths:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        transferableMonths:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    EstimatedPaymentPlan:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        dateOfBirth:
          type: string
        workPeriodFrom:
          type: string
        workPeriodTo:
          type: string
        wageDetails:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/WageDetail'
        totalWages:
          type: number
          format: float
        estimatedMonthlyWagesGross:
          type: number
          format: float
    WageDetail:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        employer:
          type: string
        employerPeriod:
          type: string
        employerWages:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerJobRatio:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerTaxAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerIncomeAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerIncomeAmountJobRatio:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerSelfEmploymentAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        employerSelfEmploymentAmountJobRatio:
          type: number
          format: float
    PaymentPlansResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        paymentPlans:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PaymentPlan'
    PaymentPlan:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        period:
          $ref: '#/components/schemas/Period'
        estimatedAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        pensionAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        privatePensionAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        unionAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        taxAmount:
          type: number
          format: float
        estimatedPayment:
          type: number
          format: float
    PeriodEndDateResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        periodEndDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
    PeriodLengthResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        periodLength:
          type: integer
          format: int32
    PensionFundsResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        pensionFunds:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/PensionFund'
    PregnancyStatus:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        hasActivePregnancy:
          type: boolean
        pregnancyDueDate:
          type: string
          format: date-time
          nullable: true
        errorMessage:
          type: string
          nullable: true
        errorCode:
          type: integer
          format: int32
        hasError:
          type: boolean
    UnionsResponse:
      type: object
      additionalProperties: false
      properties:
        unions:
          type: array
          items:
            $ref: '#/components/schemas/Union'
